# Install In One Command
```bash
bash -c "$(curl -s https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ysfgrgO7/nvoid/main/.github/NVOID-Install.sh)"
```


# Install LSP
+ it comes by default with <Lua,vim,bash> languages
```vim
:LspInstall <Language name>
```
